title: Can you help me understand why it\'s perfectly legal to sell Whipped Cream dispensers and the viles of Nitro Oxcide that teens and adults use for huffing. How is possible that something so deadly is legal to purchase?
text:
Because of the volume of questions we get daily, we can only answer
ones that deal with specific questions about coastal North Carolina.



However, I can say that many things are legal that pose a serious
risk to people, including alcohol, cigarettes and even cough syrup.
The FDA approves these products, so if you feel strongly one of these
products should be taken off the market, please direct your concerns
to www.fda.gov/



Thanks for using MyReporter.com
